reviews.text: Best thing ever lad like all you do is search something and tada it's there very good for RP.
reviews.author: Hogzz, Nova Designs

reviews.text: Nova designs is amazing, they helped me create my website and run it all for me. All I needed to do was give them a description of what I wanted the website to be about, and some design ideas as well as the name, and boom, I was shown images of it within a day.
reviews.author: Destiny scripts, Nova Designs

homepage.aboutText: Nova Designs is a premier design and development studio focused on delivering high-quality solutions to our clients. Our team of experts specializes in web design, Discord bots, and graphic designs.
homepage.contactText: If you have any questions or need support, feel free to reach out to us on Discord. Click the button below to join our server.
homepage.popupTitle: Terms of Service and Privacy Policy

forumPosts.title: Our Universal Expansion Plan
forumPosts.content: We are excited to announce our universal expansion plan! We are already implementing language support for English, German, French, Dutch, Russian, and Spanish. This initiative aims to enhance accessibility and inclusivity for our global community. Additionally, we're proud to introduce our redesigned website, offering a more intuitive and engaging user experience.

forumPosts.title: Sold Emergency Navigator
forumPosts.content: We're excited to announce that Emergency Navigator has been successfully sold to a new owner. As a development studio, we'll continue to support the project, collaborating closely with the new owner to ensure its success. Stay tuned for more updates!

forumPosts.title: Welcome to the Forums
forumPosts.content: Welcome to our community forum! This is the hub where we share exciting updates, announce new releases, and discuss important developments. As the exclusive poster, I'll keep you informed on all the latest news, events, and opportunities to engage.
